document_data.caption: A map showing Thom in central Halruaa.
document_data.name: Thom
document_data.mainbody: '''Thom''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Thom was located on the plains of central Halruaa near the [[Halar Hills]]. The town lay north of the [[River Halar]] and east of the [[River Aluar]].
